title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies for Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational concepts in elementary science
context.additional_context: Requires systematic cognitive load management strategies for learners unfamiliar with real-time video classes using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can reduce extraneous cognitive load by over 30% when viewing video-based science learning materials
Learners can apply at least three strategies to effectively manage intrinsic cognitive load necessary for understanding learning content
Learners can explain science concepts with over 80% accuracy in online learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
